item.title: CIS EKS Benchmark assessment using kube-bench
item.description: CIS EKS Benchmark assessment using kube-bench Security is a critical component of configuring and maintaining Kubernetes clusters and applications. Amazon EKS provides secure, managed Kubernetes clusters by default, but you still need to ensure that you configure the nodes and applications you run as part of the cluster to ensure a secure implementation. Since CIS Kubernetes Benchmark provides good practice guidance on security configurations for Kubernetes clusters, customers asked us for guidance on CIS Kubernetes Benchmark for Amazon EKS to meet their security and compliance requirements.
